trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <see cref="T:System.Data.DataSet" /> with the associated database.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> non genera automaticamente le istruzioni SQL necessarie per risolvere le modifiche apportate a un <xref:System.Data.DataSet> con l'origine dati associata.

trans-unit.source: However, you can create an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> object to automatically generate SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, è possibile creare un <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> oggetto per generare automaticamente le istruzioni SQL per gli aggiornamenti a tabella singola, se si imposta la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> proprietà del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: Quindi, generate da tutte le istruzioni SQL aggiuntive non si imposta la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> eventi ogni volta che si imposta la <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> proprietà.

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: È possibile associare solo uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> oggetto tra loro in una sola volta.

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Per generare istruzioni INSERT, UPDATE o DELETE, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> utilizza il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> proprietà da recuperare automaticamente un set di metadati richiesto.

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata is retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se si modifica il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> dopo il recupero di metadati, ad esempio dopo il primo aggiornamento, è necessario chiamare il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> metodo per aggiornare i metadati.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> also uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> utilizza inoltre il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Transaction%2A> proprietà a cui fa riferimento il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: L'utente deve chiamare <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se uno o più di queste proprietà vengono modificati o se il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> stessa viene sostituita.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> mantengono i valori precedenti.

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se si chiama <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> viene annullata l'associazione di <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>, e i comandi generati non vengono più utilizzati.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>, along <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> and <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>, to select rows from a data source.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio seguente usa il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>, <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> e <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection>per selezionare le righe da un'origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The example is passed an initialized <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, a connection string, a query string that is an SQL SELECT statement, and a string that is the name of the data source table.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio viene passato un oggetto inizializzato <xref:System.Data.DataSet>, una stringa di connessione, una stringa di query che rappresenta un'istruzione SQL SELECT e una stringa che rappresenta il nome della tabella di origine dati.

trans-unit.source: The example then creates an <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>.
trans-unit.target: L'esempio crea quindi un <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder" /> class.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder" /> class with the associated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter" /> object.

The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specificato in questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> viene rilasciato.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter" /> object for which SQL statements are automatically generated.
An <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> registra se stesso come un listener per <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.RowUpdating> gli eventi generati dal <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> specificato in questa proprietà.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea una nuova istanza <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>, qualsiasi esistente <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> associato a questo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter> viene rilasciato.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
The derived parameters are added to the <see cref="P:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters" /> collection of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" />.

Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> and populates the <see cref="P:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.Parameters" /> collection of the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object.
<xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> overwrites any existing parameter information for the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> sovrascrive qualsiasi informazione esistente sui parametri per il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> requires an additional call to the data source to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> richiede un'ulteriore chiamata all'origine dati per ottenere le informazioni.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se le informazioni sui parametri è noto in anticipo, risulta più efficiente per popolare la raccolta di parametri impostando le informazioni in modo esplicito.

trans-unit.source: You can only use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare solo <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> con le stored procedure.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> to populate the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.DeriveParameters%2A> per popolare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbParameterCollection> con le istruzioni Transact-SQL arbitrarie, ad esempio un'istruzione SELECT con parametri.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [configurazione dei parametri e tipi di dati di parametro](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

trans-unit.source: The underlying OLE DB provider does not support returning stored procedure parameter information, the command text is not a valid stored procedure name, or the <see cref="P:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandType" /> specified was not <see langword="StoredProcedure" />.
Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform deletions at the data source.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform deletions.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
If <see langword="false" />, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform deletions at the data source.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform deletions.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna alternativa.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Questo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.

trans-unit.source: The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> espressione regolare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform insertions at the data source.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il testo del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform insertions.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il testo del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
If <see langword="false" />, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform insertions at the data source.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform insertions.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the text of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il testo del <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna alternativa.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Questo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.

trans-unit.source: The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> espressione regolare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform updates at the data source.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Un'applicazione può utilizzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> a scopo di metodo informativi o di risoluzione dei problemi in quanto restituisce il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> oggetto da eseguire.

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: È inoltre possibile utilizzare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> come base di un comando modificato.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform updates at the data source.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform updates.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If <see langword="true" />, generate parameter names matching column names, if it is possible.
If <see langword="false" />, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
Gets the automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform updates at the data source, optionally using columns for parameter names.
The automatically generated <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand" /> object required to perform updates.

An application can use the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand> object to be executed.

trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile chiamare <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> e modificare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> valore e quindi impostato in modo esplicito che il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter>.

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver generata l'istruzione SQL, l'applicazione deve chiamare in modo esplicito <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> se viene modificato l'istruzione in alcun modo.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will be still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> sarà continuerà a utilizzare le informazioni dell'istruzione precedente, che potrebbe non essere corretto.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> or <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Le istruzioni SQL vengono generate quando l'applicazione chiama uno <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbDataAdapter.UpdateCommand*> o <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: Durante la generazione di nomi di parametro, il comportamento predefinito consiste nell'usare @p1, @p2, e così via per i diversi parametri.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Il passaggio di `true` per il `useColumnsForParameterNames` parametro consente di forzare il <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> generi i parametri in base ai nomi di colonna alternativa.

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met:
trans-unit.target: Questo ha esito positivo solo se vengono soddisfatte le condizioni seguenti:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> è stato specificato e la sua lunghezza è uguale o maggiore rispetto al nome di parametro generato.

trans-unit.source: The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> regular expression.
trans-unit.target: Il nome di parametro generato soddisfa i criteri specificati nel <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> espressione regolare.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> is specified.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> specificato.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The original unquoted identifier.
Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.
Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
The unquoted identifier to be returned in quoted format.
When a connection is passed, causes the managed wrapper to get the quote character from the OLE DB provider.

When no connection is passed, the string is quoted using values from <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuotePrefix" /> and <see cref="P:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.QuoteSuffix" />.
Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The quoted version of the identifier.
Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
The <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbConnection" />.
Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
This includes correctly un-escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes correctly un-escaped.
